examples: Although they have their differences, there's no denying that they share a lot of similarities - like mother, like daughter, they have a strong bond and connection.
So, similarity inherited from a common ancestor?
We have similarities in some of those departments.
What are the similarities?
The genetic similarities become more and more different.
words.defineEn: the state of having characteristics, appearances, qualities, etc. that are very alike but not the same
words.defineVi: trạng thái có đặc điểm, ngoại hình, phẩm chất, v.v. rất giống nhau nhưng không giống nhau

examples: The scholarship fund had made a difference in a lot of people's lives.
Exercise can make a big difference to your state of health.
It could mean the difference between a red-letter day and an empty basket.
Make a difference by doing what?
He got the hook, reportedly due to differences with his co-star.
words.defineEn: the way that two or more people or things are different from each other
words.defineVi: cách mà hai hoặc nhiều người hoặc vật khác nhau

examples: The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
My vegetarian friend often uses beans as a filling for vegetarian tacos.
As kids we used to fight like cats and dogs.
People around the world enjoy various forms of music as a universal language.
The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
words.defineEn: used to show that someone or something looks like someone or something else
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trông giống như một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó khác

examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
Both drivers shared the blame for the accident.
Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
They both pay their employees badly.
She raised both arms above her head.
words.defineVi: đề cập đến hai điều cùng nhau

examples: These two functions are identical.
So the change in potential energy is actually identical.
And the arguments for the Southern Hemisphere are identical.
The trends are close to identical.
Gros Michel bananas were all genetically identical.
words.defineEn: similar in every detail and totally alike
words.defineVi: giống nhau đến từng chi tiết và hoàn toàn giống nhau

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: sharing the same qualities or features
words.defineVi: chia sẻ những phẩm chất hoặc tính năng giống nhau
